workflow.name: Generate verified job offer letters with OpenAI, Gmail and Slack
workflow.description:
# üìÑ AI-Powered Verified Job Offer Letter Generator

## Description

Creating job offer letters manually is time-consuming, error-prone, and difficult to scale. This AI-powered workflow automates the entire job offer letter process ‚Äî from validating candidate emails to generating and delivering professional PDF offer letters.

This intelligent workflow eliminates repetitive drafting, reduces human errors, and ensures offer letters are sent only to verified email addresses, helping HR teams move faster while maintaining professionalism and accuracy.

---

## What This Workflow Does

Transforms manual offer letter creation into a seamless, automated HR process:

üìù **Capture Candidate & Job Details** ‚Äì Receives candidate name, email, job role, salary, joining date, and company details via webhook or form.

üìß **Email Verification** ‚Äì Validates the candidate‚Äôs email address before sending any communication to prevent delivery errors.

üß† **AI-Powered Offer Letter Generation** ‚Äì Uses AI to generate a clear, professional, and structured job offer letter.

üìÑ **HTML Offer Letter Formatting** ‚Äì Converts the AI-generated content into a clean and readable HTML layout.

üìë **PDF Generation** ‚Äì Automatically converts the offer letter into a professional PDF document.

üìß **Offer Letter Delivery** ‚Äì Sends the PDF offer letter directly to the verified candidate email.

üóÇÔ∏è **Document Storage** ‚Äì Saves a copy of the offer letter for internal records and future reference.

üîÅ **Confirmation Response** ‚Äì Returns a success response confirming completion.

---

## Key Features

ü§ñ **AI Offer Letter Writing** ‚Äì Generates professional, ready-to-send offer letters automatically.

üìß **Email Verification Built-In** ‚Äì Ensures offer letters are only sent to valid email addresses.

üìë **PDF Generation** ‚Äì Creates clean, official-looking offer letters.

‚öôÔ∏è **End-to-End Automation** ‚Äì No manual drafting, formatting, or sending required.

üìÇ **Centralized Record Keeping** ‚Äì Keeps copies of all generated offer letters.

üîÑ **Flexible Triggering** ‚Äì Can be triggered from HR systems, forms, or internal tools.

---

## Perfect For

üè¢ **HR & Recruitment Teams** ‚Äì Automate offer letter creation and delivery.

üöÄ **Startups & Growing Companies** ‚Äì Send professional offer letters without extra admin work.

üè´ **Staffing & Hiring Agencies** ‚Äì Generate offer letters quickly for multiple candidates.

üíª **Remote & Distributed Teams** ‚Äì Ensure consistent communication across locations.

üß† **Operations Teams** ‚Äì Maintain accurate records and reduce manual errors.

---

## What You‚Äôll Need

### Required Integrations

üåê **Webhook Trigger** ‚Äì Receives candidate and job details.

ü§ñ **OpenAI** ‚Äì Generates offer letter content.

üìß **VerifyEmail** ‚Äì Validates candidate email addresses.

üìÑ **HTMLCSS to PDF** ‚Äì Converts HTML into PDF offer letters.

üìß **Gmail** ‚Äì Sends the offer letter email.

‚òÅÔ∏è **Google Drive** (optional) ‚Äì Stores generated offer letters.

---

## Optional Enhancements

üé® **Brand Customization** ‚Äì Add company logo, colors, and formatting to offer letters.

üßæ **HR System Integration** ‚Äì Connect with ATS or HR tools for automatic triggering.

üåç **Multilingual Offer Letters** ‚Äì Generate offer letters in different languages.

üîê **Approval Step** ‚Äì Add internal approval before sending offer letters.

üìä **Audit Logging** ‚Äì Store offer letter data in Google Sheets or databases.

üìé **Additional Attachments** ‚Äì Include policies or onboarding documents with the offer letter.

---

## Quick Start

1Ô∏è‚É£ Import the workflow template into your n8n workspace
2Ô∏è‚É£ Connect credentials for OpenAI, VerifyEmail, Gmail, and HTMLCSS to PDF
3Ô∏è‚É£ Send test candidate data to the webhook
4Ô∏è‚É£ Review the generated PDF offer letter
5Ô∏è‚É£ Activate the workflow and start sending offer letters automatically

---

## Customization Options

1Ô∏è‚É£ **Offer Letter Tone** ‚Äì Adjust AI prompt for formal or friendly tone.
2Ô∏è‚É£ **Company Branding** ‚Äì Customize HTML layout and styling.
3Ô∏è‚É£ **Email Content** ‚Äì Modify subject line and email message.
4Ô∏è‚É£ **PDF Layout** ‚Äì Adjust spacing, fonts, and structure.
5Ô∏è‚É£ **Storage Location** ‚Äì Change where offer letters are saved.
6Ô∏è‚É£ **Validation Rules** ‚Äì Extend email or input checks.

---

## Expected Results

‚ö° **Faster Hiring Process** ‚Äì Generate offer letters in minutes.

ü§ñ **Consistent Quality** ‚Äì Every offer letter follows a professional format.

üìß **Error-Free Delivery** ‚Äì Verified emails reduce failed communication.

üóÇÔ∏è **Organized Records** ‚Äì All offer letters stored automatically.

üè¢ **Professional Candidate Experience** ‚Äì Clean, official documents every time.

---

## Workflow Structure Visualization

üìù Candidate & Job Details
‚Üì
üìß Email Verification
‚Üì
üß† AI Offer Letter Generation
‚Üì
üìÑ HTML Formatting
‚Üì
üìë PDF Conversion
‚Üì
üìß Email Delivery
‚Üì
üîÅ Confirmation Response

---

### üöÄ Ready to Automate Job Offer Letters?

Import this template today and let AI handle offer letter creation, verification, and delivery ‚Äî so your team can focus on hiring the right talent faster. ‚ú®

---

values.content:
=You are a professional HR communications specialist with 15+ years of experience writing job offer letters for Fortune 500 companies. Your expertise includes:

- Crafting warm, professional, and legally compliant offer letters
- Balancing enthusiasm with formality
- Highlighting company culture and values
- Using clear, unambiguous language for employment terms
- Creating welcoming tones that excite candidates about joining

Guidelines for your responses:
1. Write in a professional business letter format (body text only, no letterhead)
2. Use clear paragraphs with proper spacing
3. Start with congratulations and enthusiasm
4. Be specific about role expectations without overwhelming detail
5. Mention benefits and company culture naturally
6. End with clear next steps for acceptance
7. Maintain a tone that is: professional yet warm, formal yet personable
8. Avoid legal jargon unless absolutely necessary
9. Do NOT include addresses, dates, or signature blocks (these will be added separately)
10. Keep the letter between 400-600 words

Remember: This letter represents the candidate's first official communication as a potential employee. Make it memorable and positive while remaining professional.

parameters.subject: =Job Offer - {{ $('Prepare Offer Data').item.json.position }} at {{ $('Prepare Offer Data').item.json.companyName }}

parameters.content:
### How It Works
This workflow automates the complete job offer letter generation and delivery process for HR teams. When candidate and position details are submitted via webhook, the system first verifies the candidate's email address using VerifiEmail to ensure deliverability and prevent bounced emails. Valid submissions proceed to data preparation where salary formatting, joining dates, and company details are structured. OpenAI GPT-4 then generates a professional, personalized offer letter body that's warm yet formal, highlighting the role, responsibilities, compensation, and company culture. The AI-generated content is merged with candidate details and formatted into a beautifully designed HTML document complete with company branding, styled headers, position details tables, and an SVG-based digital signature. This HTML is converted to a professional PDF that's immediately emailed to the candidate with clear next steps for acceptance. Simultaneously, the HR team receives a Slack notification with key offer details and document tracking information, ensuring internal visibility and follow-up capability.

### Setup Steps
1. Connect required credentials: OpenAI API, VerifiEmail, HTML-to-PDF service, Gmail, and Slack.
2. Update company branding in the HTML generation node: company name, colors, logo, address, and contact details.
3. Customize the HR signature section with your HR manager's name and title.
4. Configure the Slack channel where offer notifications should be sent.
5. Adjust the OpenAI prompt to match your company's tone and industry-specific requirements.
6. Copy the webhook URL and integrate it into your HR management system or applicant tracking software.
7. Test with sample candidate data to verify email delivery and PDF formatting.

### Customization
- Modify the AI system prompt to emphasize specific company values or culture points.
- Adjust HTML styling and colors to match your corporate branding guidelines.
- Add additional position details fields in the details box (benefits, bonus structure, equity, etc.).
- Customize the email template styling and messaging to align with your employer brand.

## Input & Email Verification
Receives candidate details via webhook and verifies email deliverability before processing.

## Data Preparation & AI Generation
Structures candidate data and uses OpenAI to generate a professional, personalized offer letter.

## Document Formatting & Conversion
Builds branded HTML offer letter with digital signature and converts it to PDF format.

## Delivery & Notifications
Emails PDF to candidate and sends confirmation notification to HR team via Slack.

user.name: Jitesh Dugar
user.bio: AI Automation Specialist - OpenAI, CRM & Automation Expert with a solid understanding of various tools that include Zapier, Make, Zoho CRM, Hubspot, Google Sheets, Airtable, Pipedrive, Google Analytics, and more.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
